title: Destroy Weapons
data:
{{obsolete}}
'''Destroy Weapons''' is an ability granted to all worshippers of [[Elyvilon]]. When used, it destroys all weapons and ammo on the character's current tile. Destroying items in this way has a chance of increasing [[piety]] based on the type and quality of the item, with a 100% chance for [[evil]] items. Inscribe any items with '''{!D}''' to prevent their accidental destruction.

This ability has no cost except for the use of your turn.
